extendedInfo.description: Published by HIT, this comprehensive app offers detailed information on the legal aspects of drugs. It covers the classification of illegal drugs, and the penalties for possession, supply and using drugs on premises. Specific information is given on cautions for those over and under 18 years old.The app also includes information on growing and producing drugs, driving, drug testing and detection periods.HIT was established in 1985 to reduce drug-related harm and set up one of the worldâs first HIV prevention projects for people who use drugs. It is one of the leading agencies in the world dealing with education, information and training about legal and illegal drugs.
